Sunhawk lands and opens a link to Talos.

Sunhawk:  Talos I'm back with another prisoner in stasis.  Condor's 
behind me with another, and Grimlock should be behind him with 
another.  Kup's gathering some energon the Preds dug up.  I'm taking 
this one down to be revived with the other.

He transforms and takes Drillbit down to the prison.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Condor:
> 
> Condor moved towards the directions that Sunhawk said.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> > ::Kup:: 
> > 
> > He arrived and heard the orders. 
> > 
> > "Well you all heard him. Find a Predacon, and head back to base. 
> I'll worry about the energon deposite."
> > 
> > He looked at it.
> > 
> > "It is too big to take alone. I'll have to use lasers to break a 
> part off, and take back. However I'll have to do that in robot 
mode. 
> With this much energon, and being this close, it will take several 
> sessions of working, and staying in car mode too do this. I'm going 
> to be here a while."
> > 
> > Kup transformes to bot mode, and starts cutting the energon with 
> his laser blaster.
